title: Cold Brew Concentrate
instructions: Measure out the water into a quart mason jar.
Add the coffee and stir to combine.
Let stand for 12-24 hours - 15 is about ideal, longer brings out more bitter notes.
Line a fine mesh sieve with a coffee filter and place over medium bowl.
Slowly pour the mixture through the filter being careful not to overflow.
Transfer into a bottle, cover tightly, and store in refrigerator until ready to use.
notes: To make into coffee, add ice and dilute about 2:1 with cool and/or milk.
